oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and formation of supramolecular spherical aggregates from poly(benzyl ether) dendrimers having 21-oxoporphyrin core
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMARESAN, D
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: porphyrins
energy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of second generation poly(benzyl ether) dendrimers having N3O porphyrin at its core and the first observation of large micro-meter sized spherical aggregates as confirmed by optical microscopy and AFM analysis are reported.
